p.i: Tarnished trumpet with engravings of skeletal figures. It produces a bone-rattling sound when blown.

description.p: Benefit When blown, you summon an undead creature up to the same LV as yours, exact type is up to the GM. It is under your control and acts on your turn for 5 rounds before disappearing. Only one can appear at a time.
Curse If the battle is over before the 5 rounds are up, the undead attacks you before disappearing as originally scheduled.
